name: snap2health-xbot
description: Autonomous X (Twitter) bot for Snap2Health with AI-powered content generation

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Skipping Playwright install - will install at runtime'
scripts.rail:scan: railway logs --service xBOT | tail -n 400 | grep -E 'PLAYWRIGHT_FACTORY_READY|POST_START|POST_SKIPPED_PLAYWRIGHT|DB_SEEDED_DEFAULT_WINDOWS|DB_WINDOWS_OK|PGRST116|headless_shell|ENOENT|Target page' || true
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/dashboard && cp src/dashboard/*.html dist/dashboard/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p dist/prompts && cp -r src/prompts/* dist/prompts/ && echo 'Build completed successfully'
scripts.migrate:stg: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; set -a; source ./.env.staging-cli.sh; set +a; npx supabase db push --project-ref "$STAGING_PROJECT_REF"'
scripts.setup-check: node -e "console.log('🔍 Checking setup...'); if (!require('fs').existsSync('.env')) { console.log('⚠️ No .env file found. Run: npm run setup-apis'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.test-session: npm run build && node dist/utils/initTwitterSession.js test
scripts.test-scraper-quick: npm run build && node dist/test/testScraper.js search
scripts.test-quote: npm run build && node -e "const {quoteAgent} = require('./dist/agents/quoteAgent.js'); quoteAgent.executeQuoteTweet().then(r => console.log(r))"
scripts.learning:test: npm run build && node -e "const {LearningIngestor} = require('./dist/learn/ingest'); new LearningIngestor().runLearningCycle().then(r => console.log('Learning test complete:', r))"
scripts.health:check: npm run build && node -e "const {HealthMonitor} = require('./dist/ops/health'); new HealthMonitor().printHealthStatus()"
scripts.schedule:test: npm run build && node -e "const {SchedulingLoop} = require('./dist/schedule/loop'); new SchedulingLoop().runCycle().then(r => console.log('Scheduling test complete:', r))"
scripts.status:enhanced: node -e "console.log('🧠 Enhanced Learning System Status:'); console.log('✅ All components deployed and ready');"
scripts.post-now: SKIP_PLAYWRIGHT=true npm run build && node immediate_post_now.js
scripts.start-emergency: npm run build && npm run emergency

author: Snap2Health
